message: Topic speaks for itself. Why is this an all guys group so far?

I've invite a few people but no one has responded. Seems only certain people actually enjoy debating like this. Which may fit under 'Religious Interference'. Some people actually just get turned-off by these discussions. Seems weird to me, but then I'm of the first category
